Test Piece Contest
Recollections of Verdi
Whitehall Grounds, Lincoln, Lincolnshire, England, UK Prizes - 1st £20,shield and silver baton, 2nd £10 and music, 3rd £5 and music, 4th £2. 35th annual contest promoted by Lincoln Temperance Societies. 7 bands competed.
